Create an interactive virtual reality experience where users can explore a planet made entirely out of ice cream. They can interact with different flavors and toppings and even create their own custom creations.
Develop a mobile app that allows users to customize their own virtual character's appearance using various ice cream-themed makeup and accessories.
Create a series of short films that showcase the adventures of a group of ice cream lovers who travel to different planets in search of new and exotic flavors.
Design a line of clothing and accessories inspired by different ice cream flavors, such as cotton candy pink or mint chocolate chip green.
Launch an ice cream-themed subscription service that delivers monthly deliveries of unique and rare ice cream flavors from around the world.
